paragraph1: The Canadian Tui Na Association offers a comprehensive training program designed to equip therapists with the skills and knowledge necessary to provide high-quality Tui Na therapy. Our program ensures that members are well-prepared to meet the highest standards of professional practice.

section1.title: 1. Introduction to Massage Therapy (125 Hours)
items: Anatomy: Understanding the human body structure.
Hygiene: Best practices for maintaining a clean and safe environment.
Pathology: Identifying and understanding common ailments.
Physiology: Studying body functions and their relevance to therapy.

section2.title: 2. Theory and Practice of Massage Therapy (150 Hours)
items: Detailed Therapeutic Massage: In-depth techniques and applications.
Massage Techniques: Tui Na, Thai, Shiatsu, Swedish massage, and more.

section3.title: 3. Tui Na and Medical Treatments (100 Hours)
items: Acupuncture Meridian Concepts: Principles of Yin Yang and Fuzang.
Foot Reflexology: Techniques and manipulation of foot massage.

section4.title: 4. Reflexology (50 Hours)
items: Foot Reflex Zones: Techniques and applications for therapeutic results.

section5.title: 5. Ethics and Legal Studies (25 Hours)
items: Code of Ethics: Understanding ethical guidelines and professional conduct.
Legal Case Studies: Analyzing real-world legal scenarios and implications.
Indications and Limits of Massage: Guidelines for safe practice.

section6.title: 6. Practicum and Supervision (200 Hours)
items: Supervised Practice: Hands-on practice under expert supervision.
Interview Techniques and Record Keeping: Best practices for client interactions and maintaining accurate records.

why_train_list: Comprehensive Curriculum: Our training covers all essential aspects of Tui Na therapy.
Experienced Instructors: Learn from highly qualified and experienced professionals.
Hands-On Practice: Gain practical experience through supervised training sessions.
Professional Recognition: Our program is recognized by insurance companies, ensuring your qualifications are credible and trusted.
paragraph2: Join our training program and become a certified Tui Na therapist. Equip yourself with the knowledge, skills, and confidence to excel in your practice.
